mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (user_id, title, content, image, price, product_status, location, category_id, count, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{image}, #{price}, #{productStatus}, #{location}, #{categoryId}, #{count}, NOW(), NOW());
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET user_name = #{userName}, nickname = #{nickname}, user_password = #{userPassword}, email = #{email}, tel_1 = #{tel_1}, tel_2 = #{tel_2}, location = #{location}, user_role = #{userRole}, user_status = #{userStatus}, money = #{money} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
